ocean.question: I’m big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water
🚢 Boats float on me
🏖️ You can play in me at the beach

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm a type of animal
🏠 I carry my house on my back
🥗 Sometimes people eat me as food.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms
🎨 I can change colors
🦑 I squirt ink when I'm scared

ocean.question: I am a fish that is very flat and can sting you. What am I?

hints.text: 🦹 I can hide in the sand
🌱 I'm shaped like a pancake
⚡ Be careful not to step on me!

ocean.question: I am a big sea animal that can jump high out of the water. What am I?

hints.text: 😀 I'm very friendly and smart
🐳 I'm a mammal, not a fish
🗣️ I communicate using clicks and whistles

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔪 I'm a predator
🦈 I have a fin on my back
🏊 I'm feared by many swimmers

ocean.question: I am a type of home to many sea creatures. I am colorful and hard. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I'm made of tiny animals
🐠 Many fish live in and around me
⛱️ I protect the coast from big waves

ocean.question: I'm a very large animal with a shell, and I lay my eggs on the beach. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I'm very slow on land
🌊 I spend most of my life in the ocean
🥬 I like to eat seagrass

ocean.question: I’m a very large whale that sings songs in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 My songs can travel very far
🐋 I'm a type of baleen whale
🌊 I migrate long distances every year

ocean.question: I am something that washes up on the beach. I am often pretty and have a home inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I used to be a home for a sea creature
👂 You can sometimes hear the ocean when you hold me to your ear
✨ People often collect me

weather.question: I fall from the sky and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants need me to live.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and give you light. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am in the sky during the day.
🔥 I am very hot.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I am bright.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like a sheep.
🌧️ Sometimes I bring rain.
☁️ I block the sun.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🌬️ I am invisible.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make a snowman with me.
🧣 You need to wear a hat and mittens when I fall.
⚪ I am made of tiny ice crystals.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very bright and scary.
🌩️ Thunder often follows me.
💡 I'm a natural form of electricity.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that follows lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I boom and rumble.
⛈️ I come during a storm.
👂 You can hear me from far away.

weather.question: I am many colors that appear after it rains and the sun shines. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ I am an arc in the sky.
🍀 Some people think there's a pot of gold at the end of me.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky like little stones. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you.
⛈️ I often come with thunderstorms.
🍬 I am small and round, like candy but colder.

weather.question: I am a thick cloud that is close to the ground and makes it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am like a cloud on the ground.
🚗 You have to drive slowly when I am around.
👻 Sometimes I feel spooky.
